attributes.review: The layout of the app is hard on the eyes and quite frankly it’s hard to move around, it constantly glitches and would place me back on my home screen, overall one star and I do not recommend.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This isn’t real. This is spam. This app is promoting racism, bigotry, and hatred. We are in a simulation. This app is harmful. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. If you do download make sure to review it with a 1 Star. Because we are DONE, burn it down. We aren’t going down without a fight. This app is going to hurt you, this app will tune you into a racist.
attributes.title: This app is fake

attributes.review: Every time I go on it freezes my phone or crashes it. But when I finally got on there was this giant orange blob out of of nowhere on my screen. I was disgusted and tried getting rid of it but it wouldn’t leave. So I decided to delete the app worst experience ever
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: if I could give this app less than 1 star I would. this lil Cheeto man made the worst app ever it froze my phone, stole my social and credit card information, threatened a baby, kicked a puppy, and spammed my phone even after I turned off notifications. YUUUUGE disappointment
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: When u opened this app, I saw one of the worst sights I have ever seen. The unnatural orange shade, the racism, the misogyny, the xenophobia, the narcissism, the islamophobia, the anti-Arab sentiment, and the homophobia affected my brain so bad that it BLINDED ME. I was knocked unconscious from this horrible sight and this app is responsible. If you care about your health and ever seeing again DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!! WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE

attributes.review: what an awful app this is! i was so excited to download it and support our ✨🔥amazing and perfect✨🔥 president, but unfortunately this app fell short of my expectations😔 its so disappointing to see someone so great create such a subpar app. ugh. its almost like his publicity team wants to create a bad image for him 😭😭 its so hard to see 🥺🥺😔✨✨ i guess everything everyone says ab him is true ..... its so hard to accept that he is a racist piece of literal garbage that holds no regard for human life 😔😔😔 but, i guess i’ll just have to move on! 🤪🤪🤪
attributes.title: terrible app!

attributes.review: When I opened the app my dog started flying and my fish went on a walk. When I came back inside my couch was on its head and then i cried because my TV was swimming. I fought my pizza because it kept eating me and my scissors were trying to break it up. Therefore this app is terrible.
attributes.title: absolutely ATROCIOUS

attributes.review: When i downloaded the app i constantly was bombarded with popups wanting me to donate to the trump administration, it made my phone crash multiple times and it stopped working 9/10 times while i was just reading through things, the worst
attributes.title: 🥰no✨

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and once I got it the app immediately crashed and started glitching out. After that I closed the app then opened it again and i got a notification from the app saying it wanted me to die. 1/10 I DO NOT recommend ✨💕🧚🏻
attributes.title: Terrible app do not recommend

attributes.review: When I opened this app it made my phone crash and so I lhad to turn it off and back on but when I did it still wasn't working what type of app doesn't work come on fix it. Signed by ~Yourfavoritegenz
attributes.title: This app made my phone crash
